page.title: 09** HELEN'S BIRTHDAY **
page.content: My birthday is on the 23rd of November. Last year my birthday was on a Wednesday. As my birthday is so near to Christmas I don't get a lot of presents. I woke up at 7 o'clock and dashed downstairs. The postman had not arrived, so I went into the lounge to open up my presents. They were wrapped in paper with love hearts on it. I opened the largest one first and in there I found a jumper. It was made from wool and it was blue and pink striped. It also had a lace collar. I opened one other parcel and in it was a pair of slipper-socks. They have blue bottoms and creamy coloured socks with a blue and pink pattern on them. Both my presents were very nice. I ate some breakfast which consisted of two slices of toast with some jam on them and a cup of tea with no sugar. {Continued on page 10}
